name: Laser Reload
description:
You are tiny robot. 

Your mission is to get to the portal through guarded dungeon. 

Your main tool is a plasma gun, which is in the robot's head. Its charge, which indicates the distance in tiles that the robot is able to shoot, accumulates as you walk: one tile is one charge, maximum is 4. The charge counter is the robot's eyes: the more they are filled with energy, the more charge he has.

In the dungeon you will meet turrets that can incinerate the hero with their deadly lasers.

Use Left Mouse Button to walk and destroy enemies.

Use R button to reload level.

Good luck!

PS The game is currently in development. New levels are coming soon!
